 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּ֫קַח‎</span> **proper name, masculine** ==usurping king of Israel==, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Φακεε</span> (***opening*** (? of eyes), or compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flower***; compare proper name, masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פקח‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פקח‎</span>, on old Israel seals; in Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Pa‡a—a***</u></abbr> (accusative) [[BDB#Schr|Schr]]<sup>COT 2k 15, 30</sup>); — [[2Kgs.15.25|2Kgs 15:25]]; [[2Kgs.15.27|2Kgs 15:27]]; [[2Kgs.15.29|2Kgs 15:29]]; [[2Kgs.15.30|2Kgs 15:30]]; [[2Kgs.15.31|2Kgs 15:31]]; [[2Kgs.15.32|2Kgs 15:32]]; [[2Kgs.15.37|2Kgs 15:37]]; [[2Kgs.16.1|2Kgs 16:1]]; [[2Kgs.16.5|2Kgs 16:5]]; [[Isa.7.1|Isa 7:1]]; [[2Chr.28.6|2Chr 28:6]].
